purpose: The email announces three upcoming full-time faculty positions in the Computer Science department at UCLouvain, Belgium, targeting candidates in software engineering and security. It encourages recipients to forward the information to high-profile candidates seeking permanent positions at a prestigious university. The positions are open to all seniority levels and highlight the benefits of working at UCLouvain, including a vibrant work environment, excellent research infrastructure, and competitive salaries. Interested candidates are invited to contact the department chair for more information before the official job announcement in early September.
